summary: A content management platform with photo boxes, admin controls, editable resources, and a gallery tab. Viewers on the live version have read-only access â€” only admins can edit content or write articles.
architectural_notes: Viewer permissions are read-only on the live version; only admins can edit content or write articles.

existing_features.title: Implement an admin authentication gate using Internet Identity: only a logged-in admin (authenticated via Internet Identity) may see or use any Add, Edit, or Delete buttons/dialogs across all sections (MissionPage, LatestProgress, EcosystemSpotlight, CybercrimeAwareness, InvestingWisdom, TrustedResources, XPosts, HomePageLinks). Unauthenticated visitors see the content in read-only mode with no mutation controls exposed.
